objects.text: • 925 Sterling Silver • Rose Gold Plated • Premium Quality

product_details.name: GIVA 925 Sterling Silver Rose Gold Pink Drop Wreath Studs | Gift for Girlfriend Wife Women & Girls | With Certificate of Authenticity and 925 Stamp | 6 Month Warranty*

- Product Dimensions: 1.27 x 1.3 x 1.27 cm; 3.9 g.
- Item part number: ER0583.
- Department: womens.
- Item Weight: 3.9 g.
- Item Dimensions Lx Wx H: 13 x 13 x 13 Millimeters.
- Net Quantity: 2.00 count.
- Generic Name: Stud Earrings.
- Customer Reviews: 4.5 4.5 out of 5 stars 71 ratings.

banner_details:
This banner design showcases a luxurious and feminine theme for a jewelry brand. It features a soft, gradient pink background layered with flowing curved shapes and subtle decorative elements, creating depth and elegance. At the top, the bold heading text layer ("heading") introduces the brand in a dark brown tone, followed by a stylish serif subheading layer ("subheading") describing the product type. The center is dominated by a high-resolution product image ("product_image") placed on a white circular backdrop emphasized with a rose gold border. A circular badge element ("price_badge") highlights the price with a bold white text layer ("price"). At the bottom, a brown text layer ("description") lists key features, and a rounded rectangle button ("cta_button") with white text ("cta") serves as a call to action.

**Color Palette**:
- Light Pink (#FFD1DC)
- Deeper Pink (#FFBBC5)
- Rose Gold (#BD8C7D)
- Muted Brown (#8B4513)
- Warm White (#FFFFFF)
- Mauve Pink (#A95C68)
product_color: This elegant jewelry piece features a soft, feminine color palette perfect for a delicate and luxurious advertisement banner. The base color is a warm rose gold (#F6B3B0) that outlines and frames the design, creating a polished and luxurious effect. The petal-shaped stones exhibit a soft blush pink hue (#FAD4D4), lending a romantic and graceful touch. Clear, faceted crystals in brilliant white (#FFFFFF) and silver reflections (#D8D8D8) add sparkle and contrast, enhancing the richness of the metallic tones. The colors harmonize beautifully—rose gold contrasts yet blends with the crystals, making both elements pop while maintaining visual synergy.
